properties.address: Hedingham Baptist Church, Sible Hedingham, Essex CO9 3PX
properties.description: We provide a friendly face to chat to about anything. We have a variety of other activities outside of the Hotspot times, ranging from craft group, coffee morning and Mental health and Wellbeing groups. For full details and times please see our website.
properties.title: Nick Vosper

properties.address: St Mary's Church Hall. Church Street, Bocking, Essex CM7 5JY
properties.description: Each Friday from 12noon to 3pm you are invited to join us for food, company, and friendship. We meet in our lovely warm and comfortable hall with hot food from 12noon. There are refreshments throughout and cake too, of course! Everyone is welcome whether they are local or travelling from further afar. Come alone or bring a group of you, there is a place for everyone. There is no charge either, it is all free. Some choose to make a donation but this isn't necessary at all. We are running until Dec 15th, with a short break over Christmas and then back in the New Year. We hope to see you soon.
properties.title: St Mary's Church, Bocking

properties.description: The Community House is proud to host a warm hub every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday between 10.00 am and Midday. In conjunction with the Parish Council and many volunteers from the parish, there is always tea, coffee and biscuits available completely free of charge. There is also a selection of board games available.
properties.title: Birdbrook Warm Hub

properties.address: Braintree CM7 3HT, UK
properties.description: Warm Spaces - Every Monday (10am to 1pm). Free cup of tea and lunch available.
properties.title: Elim Church Braintree

properties.address: 177 Swan St, Sible Hedingham, Halstead CO9 3PX, UK
properties.description: Hedingham Hotspot is a safe, warm space for members of the community to come to during the winter months; in part, as a response to the energy and cost of living crises.   The project allows people to have access to: Free parking and disabled access Free WiFi Free power for charging devices Free warmth Free tea and coffee A friendly face to chat to A range of free activities such as board games and crafts We believe that there is a need to be met in the Hedinghams and surrounding areas for potentially vulnerable adults and children who may be at risk of being cold and isolated due to the economic situation. In providing a safe and warm place for people to come to, we hope to alleviate some of that risk and provide a way for the community to come together in a practical way. There is opportunity to talk, participate in activities and also, the Hotspot team may be able to signpost other services which may be available for people who attend; we already run a Christians Against Poverty Life Skills course and also a Wellbeing Group in partnership with Kintsugi/Hope so we have access to partners who can potentially offer a wider range of specialist services. We are a Warm Space.
properties.title: Hedingham Hotspot

properties.address: 29 Bocking End, Braintree CM7 9AE, UK
properties.description: Affordable Counselling- 1:1 appointments (assessments for interventions carried out by our qualified counselling co-ordinator) Benefits Advice- via signposting Community Fridge- Access to fresh food via our commitment as a Community Fridge CV construction Education Classes: Anger Management/Understanding your Emotions Confidence/Employability courses Digital Confidence- including: Learn my Way Using a tablet and Job Seeking Skills Basic Skills via our Sunday Learning group- making learning fun! Internet Safety (All over- seen and facilitated by our qualified Education Co-ordinator) Impartial Information, Advice and Guidance (IAG) and access to our partner organisations and other providers, via our qualified IAG specialist Safe c/o address for post A meeting venue- for other organisations All offered at First Stop Centre in Braintree- our services are for all those in the Braintree district. All our classes must be booked in advance and our counselling service as well.
properties.title: First Stop

properties.address: Church St, Braintree CM7 5JY, UK
properties.description: Every Friday until the middle of March we are offering our Church Hall as a Warm Space. There will be free tea and coffee throughout the sessions which run from 11.30am to 2pm. From 12.15pm onwards there will also be a free soup lunch. Come and be warm, come along and meet friends, old and new. We are in Bocking and hope to welcome both those in our community here, but also from further afield.
properties.title: St Mary’s Church

properties.address: Manor St, Braintree CM7 3HW, UK

properties.address: Falcon Square, Castle Hedingham, Halstead CO9, UK
properties.description: There is a warm welcome and a warm space for coffee and cake at St Nicholas , Castle Hedingham on Mondays from 10.30-noon. Expect delicious home made cakes and good company as we meet with other local residents and catch up on local news.
